title: Reading Adventures
description: Read short stories and answer questions about them!

prompts.input: Read this story: 'Sam the dog was very hungry. He looked in his bowl, but it was empty. Sam walked to the kitchen and barked at his owner. His owner smiled and filled the bowl with food.' Why did Sam bark at his owner? How do you know?
hints: What happened right after he barked?

prompts.input: Read this story: 'Lily wanted to play outside, but it was raining. She felt sad looking out the window. Then she saw a rainbow! Lily smiled and said, 'Maybe the rain isn't so bad after all.' How did Lily's feelings change in the story? What made them change?
hints: How did Lily feel at the start?
How did she feel at the end?
